backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated short summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders GameScreen.
frontend/src/components/game/Hotbar.tsx: UI component showing dirt and stone counts in a styled hotbar.
frontend/src/components/game/Hud.tsx: HUD displaying movement, mining, collection instructions, and block difficulty badges.
frontend/src/components/game/Tile.tsx: Tile renderer showing block appearance, fog, damage cracking, and mining progress.
frontend/src/components/game/TouchContro: Touch-based movement and jump button layout for mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/game/WorldGrid.t: Manages world state, player movement, mining actions, and exposes onBlockMined callback.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Exports world size, dirt-to-stone row, tile size, and jump/gravity tuning constants.
frontend/src/game/inventory.ts: Defines hotbar inventory structure and helper functions for incrementing block counts.
frontend/src/game/mining.ts: Implements mining logic including adjacency-to-air checks, tile reveal rules, mining steps, and handling clicks that update the world and report broken blocks.
frontend/src/game/miningConfig.ts: Defines mining hit requirements per block type and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Declares core types for block types, tile state, positions, and the world grid.
frontend/src/game/world.ts: Generates the initial world grid with dirt over stone and a 3x3 starting air pocket.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsTouchDevice.ts: Detects touch-capable devices using touch points and pointer media queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend query integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and theme variables for light and dark mining-themed modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the main game screen with HUD, world grid, and hotbar, updating inventory on block mining.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and known issues for the mining game MVP.
